analyzed: cāturmāsyasya kālasya dvādaśī tu yā
ṣaḍaśīti mukhā divyā tasyām āropayet tu yaḥ

original: atītāṃ vartamānāṃ ca eṣyāṃ svakulasantātim // Paus_30.12 //
analyzed: atītām vartamānām ca eṣyām sva kula santātim

analyzed: bhaktānām bhagavān prītaḥ paramātmā acyutaḥ hariḥ

analyzed: nārāyaṇaḥ tu mantra ātmā sthitaḥ sannihitaḥ svayam

original: sannidhi bhajate yena mantriṇāṃ mantrarāṭ prabhuḥ // Paus_30.15 //
analyzed: sannidhi bhajate yena mantriṇām mantrarāj prabhuḥ

sva rūpam ajahan eva sannidhānataram vibhoḥ
sapta atra deśa kālānām āsṛṣṭeḥ sthitaye tu vai
atas pavitrakam tasyām anasyām tad asaṃbhavāt
kāryam kriyā paraiḥ bhaktyā sā akhaṇḍā yena jāyate
akhaṇḍa kārī puruṣaḥ jñāna karma parāyaṇaḥ
bhakti śraddhā tathā utsāha yuktaḥ yoga balaiḥ yuktaḥ
brahma vyekātma tām yāti acirāt eva pauṣkara
sarva bhāvena bhaktānām yat pālayati sarvadā
manaḥ vāc citta jam kutsnam vyāpāram śubha lakṣaṇam
parijñeḥ āyataḥ tasmāt sva rūpam tasya yādṛśam

original: phalameti ca vai yena bhaktānāṃ tatsamāpanāt // Paus_30.21 //
analyzed: phalam eti ca vai yena bhaktānām tad samāpanāt

original: jagatsūtraṃ tu tadviddhi hemasūtrādinā tu vai /

bāḍguvyam abhimānam yat dhatte pratisara ātmanā
jñāna rāga uparaktam ca yuktam kāryaiḥ tu vīrya jeḥ
taijasaiḥ āvṛttam mantraiḥ balena āvalitam param
aiśvaryam upacāre tu saṃprāpte śaktitaḥ vyayam

original: evaṃ pavitrakaṃ tāvatparijñātaṃ na tat prabhoḥ // Paus_30.25 //
analyzed: evam pavitrakam tāvat parijñātam na tat prabhoḥ
brahma vyadhipatau viṣṇau tad ākāre pratiṣṭhite

original: bhaktyā ca vidhivaddattaṃ dadāti bhagavatpadam // Paus_30.26 //
analyzed: bhaktyā ca vidhivat dattam dadāti bhagavat padam

original: padārthaiḥ kalpanīyā ca yathā tadavadhārasya // Paus_30.27 //
analyzed: padārthaiḥ kalpanīyā ca yathā tad avadhārasya

original: sūkṣmaṃ dṛḍhaṃ sitaṃ ślakṣṇaṃ sūtraṃ brahmaprasūtayā /
analyzed: sūkṣmam dṛḍham sitam ślakṣṇam sūtram brahma prasūtayā

original: vinirmitaṃ kumāryā vā vṛddhayā vā vinītayā // Paus_30.28 //
analyzed: vinirmitam kumāryā vā vṛddhayā vā vinītayā
viśuddhayā vidhavayā saṃpāditam atha api vā
yathālabdham tu ca ādāya kuryāt astra viśodhitam
avalokya smarat mūlam viniṣpādya caturguṇam
cāturātmya vyapekṣāyām athavā aṣṭagūṇam dvija
bhagavat mūrti bhede tu bheda bhinna upalakṣitam
keśava ādiṣu adhiṣṭhātṛ bhāvena tri caturguṇam

original: pavitrikī kriyā yasmādviṣamā sā na kasyacit // Paus_30.32 //
analyzed: pavitrikī kriyā yasmāt viṣamā sā na kasyacid
pavitrakāṇi kāryāṇi tantubhiḥ taiḥ su tānitaiḥ
mantra astra kumbhayoḥ pūrvam nānā mantra ālayasya ca

original: karṇikāsthasya ca vibhoḥ kesaracchadagasya ca // Paus_30.34 //
analyzed: karṇikā sthasya ca vibhoḥ kesaracchada gasya ca
vibhava vyūha rūpasya lāñchanā stra dvayasya ca
mūrdhni kaṇṭhe sayoḥ puṣpa pūjāyām upari kṣitau

original: dvayaṃ hi kuṇḍānalayoḥ śāstrapīṭhasya ca dvayam // Paus_30.36 //
analyzed: dvayam hi kuṇḍa analayoḥ śāstra pīṭhasya ca dvayam
lipeḥ vāc tattva bhūtasya śabda tattvasya ca prabhoḥ
ghaṇṭā akṣasūtra pūrvāṇām kriyā aṅgānām mahātmānām
jāyāyām bhakti namrāyām raktāyām arcane hareḥ
saṃbandhinām ca mitrāṇām bhagavat dharma sevinām
tad uttara sahāyānām cāturātmya abhilāṣiṇām
bhṛtyānām sva anukūlānām puruṣottama yājinām
vṛddhaye yoṣitā ca eva pavitrīkaraṇāya ca
pavitrīkaraṇam ramyam racanīyam yathākramam
ṣaḍadhva pīṭha saṃsthasya nānā prantra āspadasya ca
jñāna ādi guṇa bhedasya catur sthāna arcanāya ca
mukhya mantrasya ca vibhoḥ śatena aṣṭa adhikena ca
tantunā bhūṣaṇam kuryāt ardhena aṃśena vā abja ja
japa homa dikā saṃkhyā pūrṇā riktā tad ātmanā

original: samīkaroti bhaktānāṃ mantrāṇāmata eva hi // Paus_30.43 //
analyzed: samīkaroti bhaktānām mantrāṇām atas eva hi
hema sat ratna karpūra mālaya kṣoda kuṅkumaiḥ
sarva oṣadhi samopetaiḥ tvac elā ādi vimiśritaiḥ
pāvanaiḥ vividhaiḥ dravyaiḥ nirvyāja picunā saha
kuryāt tad bharbha racanām sūtra saṃkhyā upalakṣitām
bījapūra vat abja akṣaḥ ārdra āmalaka śaṅkha vat
tad antarālāni punar tu avicchinnena tu tantunā

original: yathecchayā tato 'nyeṣo yājyānāṃ parikalpya ca // Paus_30.47 //
analyzed: yathā icchayā tatas nyeṣaḥ yājyānām parikalpya ca

original: ārādhakasya ca guroḥ sagarbhaṃ bhūṣaṇadvayam // Paus_30.48 //
analyzed: ārādhakasya ca guroḥ sagarbham bhūṣaṇa dvayam
vihitam bhagavat mantra nyāsāt tādātmya bhāvanāt
atas nyeṣām agarbham ca racanīyam pavitrakam
antarāla gatam garbham kuryāt bāhlīka rañjitam
alaṃkṛtyam ca rūpakaiḥ
patra cheda samatthaiḥ tu jātarūpa mayaiḥ tu vā
śaṅkha cakra gadā padma mālā śrīvatsa kaustubhaiḥ
khageśa tāla musala nandaka jyāhala ādikaiḥ
mandāra kusuma ākāraiḥ pārijāta druma upamaiḥ
śrīvṛkṣa acala nāga indra svastikaiḥ cāmaraiḥ ghaṭaiḥ
vedha anala arciṣā āḍhyā ca vyañjanaiḥ ātapatrakaiḥ
sarit samudra vṛṣabha bhauga jālaiḥ tu sārasaiḥ

original: dhātuje pittale bhāṇḍe vastracchanne nidhāya ca /
analyzed: dhātu je pittale bhāṇḍe vastra channe nidhāya ca
dhādayet upariṣṭāt ca dhūpitena ahatena ca
kṛta āhnikaḥ dhivāsa artham daśabhyām prayataḥ śuciḥ
deśika indra dvitīyaḥ tu kartā ardhya kusuma udyataḥ
saha sat brahmaghoṣeṇa stuti maṅgala pāḍhakaiḥ
śaśāṅka udaya velāyām kṛtvā dvāstha arcanam viśan
vairāja bhuvana ākāram maṇḍapam maṇḍana aṅkitam
upaviśya yathānyāyam anatar yāga ānatam ārabhet
nyāsa pūrvam aśeṣam tu ardhya ambu parikalpanam
gaṇeśa abhyarcanam kṛtvā nirvighna phala siddhaye
kalpayet brahmakūrcam tu śodhayet vasudhām tatas
sthāpanam toraṇa ādīnām arcanam kuṇḍa saṃskṛtiḥ
mantra astra kumbha racanā tayoḥ mantra avatāraṇam
tad arcana ādikam sarvam kuryāt dīkṣā vidheḥ samam
vyāpāram ācaret divyam kumbhakena smaran vibhum

original: vibhāvyā mantriṇā kaiṃbhī āstrī rakṣārthameva hi /

original: aṣṭāṅgena namaskṛtya yadyādardhyaṃ tu mūrdhani // Paus_30.64 //

original: sāṅgaṃ sāvaraṇaṃ bhaktyā dhapūyet puruṣottamam // Paus_30.65 //

original: apāsyādāya śirasā abhivandya samarcya ca // Paus_30.66 //

phalaiḥ ratna ādika upetaiḥ pūjayet vidhinā tatas
bhaktyā krama upadiṣṭaiḥ tu bhogaiḥ kṛtsnaiḥ akṛtrimaiḥ
sarvam kṛtvā praṇāma antam yāyāt homa niketanam

kalaśa sthārcabaimbīya saṃskṛtena atha vahninā
carum saṃśrapayet culyām hṛdā kṣīra ājya taṇḍulaiḥ

kalaśa sthala vṛttīnām eka aṃśam juhuyāt tatas
dadyāt pūrṇāhutim paścāt balibhiḥ sarvam antaram
tarpayitvā ambu siktābhiḥ krameṇa juhuyāt tatas

mudrābandha ādikam tu vai
kṛtvā praṇāma paryantam sthalaḥ tasya agratas vibhoḥ
astramantreṇa saṃprokṣya kṛtsna dravya gaṇa tatas
niveśya vāyu digbhāge sarvam sūtra puraḥsaram
sita vastra anvitena eva tu akṣetena eva varmaṇā
arcayitvā astramantreṇa sthagayet kavacena caṃ

original: nārāyaṇaṃ paraṃ brahma prāṇeśa caturākṛte // Paus_30.99 //

original: devabimbe tu tanmūrtau kalaśe maṇḍalakṣitau // Paus_30.101 //

analyzed: atīta vātsarīyāṇām snāna ādīnām hi karmaṇām

original: tvāmarcayāmyahaṃ bhaktyā suptyatīte tu jāgare // Paus_30.107 //

original: vijñaptosīha bhagavan vetsi sarvaṃ hṛdi sthitam // Paus_30.108 //
analyzed: vijñaptaḥ asi iha bhagavan vetsi sarvam hṛdi sthitam

gītā nṛtta ādikaiḥ stotraiḥ veda pāṭha samanvitaiḥ

original: ṣaḍṛtuprabhavaiḥ sarvaiḥ śākairmūlaiḥ phalaiḥ śubhaiḥ // Paus_30.114 //
analyzed: ṣaṣ ṛtu prabhavaiḥ sarvaiḥ śākaiḥ mūlaiḥ phalaiḥ śubhaiḥ

original: atha bhūṣaṇapātraṃ tu ādāyoddhāṭyapūjya ca // Paus_30.119 //
analyzed: atha bhūṣaṇa pātram tu ca

original: anusandhāya vai tasmin saṃsmaran hṛdayāddhiyā // Paus_30.121 //
analyzed: anusandhāya vai tasmin saṃsmaran hṛdayāt dhiyā
tatra aṣṭa aṣṭaka saṃkhyam tu avyaktam bhoga saṃgraham

dānāni utsava pūrvāṇi nānā naimittikāni ca

hima kunda indu dhavalam nāganātham mahāmate
praṇavena sva nāmnā ca varṇa antena sa bindunā

original: dhyātvārcayitvā stutvā ca namaskṛtya prasādya ca // Paus_31.8 //
analyzed: dhyātvā arcayitvā stutvā ca namaskṛtya prasādya ca
niveśya tasmin karma arcām hāra keyūra bhūṣitam
śrīkhaṇḍa śāśi bāhlīka viliptām puṣpa veṣṭitām
prāvṛtām netra vastreṇa mṛṣṭa rūpaiḥ su dhūpitām

original: svabījaṃ mantravarṇaṃ tu oṃ lakṣmīpataye namaḥ // Paus_31.10 //
analyzed: sva bījam mantra varṇam tu om lakṣmīpataye namaḥ
samudīrya dhiyā ca ārdhyam aṅga upāṅga krameṇa tu
dvādaśa akṣara varṇaiḥ tu sva nāma pada saṃyutaiḥ
karma arcāyāḥ abhāvāt tu darbhamañjarijam śubham

original: yathoktena vidhānena viṣṭare viniveśya ca // Paus_31.12 //
analyzed: yathā uktena vidhānena viṣṭare viniveśya ca
tasmin mantra varam nyasya sva padma gagana udarāt
nilīna akhila gaṇḍa ādi śakti pañjara madhya gam
vyaktīnām mūrti dānena nītvā dhyāna anvitena ca
deva aṅga mahitam vastram abhuktam amala ātmakam
kṣtvā upari samabhyarcya puṣpa dhūpa vilepanaiḥ

original: sarvatatrvopasaṃhāraṃ citaḥ śaktiṃ tu vinyaset // Paus_31.15 //
analyzed: sarva tatra upasaṃhāram citaḥ śaktim tu vinyaset
dakṣiṇe tu abhimāna ākhyām mūrtim tu camara udyatām
evam jñāna niśām vāme tālavṛnta kara udyatām
uttamām bhāvayet nidrām kara saṃvāhane ratām
pāda aravinda deśa sthām lālayantīm kara ambujaiḥ
ādāya caraṇe divye sākṣāt śrīḥ sannidhi sthitā

original: ānandaṃ brahmaṇo rūpaṃ tasyai devādhidevatā // Paus_31.18 //
analyzed: ānandam brahmaṇaḥ rūpam tasyai deva adhidevatā
tad antar smaraṇa ānanda jāta vismaya locanāḥ
sva nāma pada mantraiḥ tāḥ saṃpūjyāḥ praṇava ādibhiḥ
evam hi devadevīyam śayanam kamalodbhava
yathoktam saṃpratiṣṭhāpya cāturmāsya paraiḥ naraiḥ
kāryā atra pratyaham pūjā mārjanam ca upalepanam
mṛdā dhātu vikāraiḥ vā sugandhaiḥ candanādikaiḥ
pradānam dhūpa dīpānām vyajanena anila utthitaḥ
kadalī dala kahlāraiḥ padma utpala vimiśritaiḥ
sveda śāntim samāpādya paunaḥpunyena pūjanam
veṇu vīṇā samopetām gītim ca madhura svarām

original: evaṃ māsadvaye yāte jāte megharave 'mbarāt // Paus_31.24 //
analyzed: evam māsa dvaye yāte jāte megha rave mbarāt

original: brahman bhādrapade māsi dvādaśyāṃ hi niśāmukhe /
analyzed: brahman bhādrapade māsi dvādaśyām hi niśā mukhe

original: īṣat prabodham āśritya devadevo hyadhokṣajaḥ // Paus_31.25 //
analyzed: īṣat prabodham āśritya devadevaḥ hi adhokṣajaḥ
sthiti artham amarāṇām ca parivartanam ācaret
dakṣiṇena aṅga saṅghena tyaktvā ca uttāna śāyikām
yoganidrām samāśritya prakurvan prabhava apyayau
marut cakra akṣa saṃsthasya viśva bījasya pauṣkara
mūla indu maṇḍalāt ca atha apāsya ācchādana ambaram

original: āste tvāśvayuje tveṣa dvādaśyāṃ parameśvaraḥ // Paus_31.28 //
analyzed: āste tu āśvayuje tu eṣa dvādaśyām parameśvaraḥ
saṃtyajet śayanam divyam niśāyām kārtikasya tu ca
utthāya amara nāthaḥ ca samākramya patatri rāj
niḥśeṣa bhuvana grāma vīthīnām doṣa śāntaye
vicarati aprameya ātmā nandayan tān sura ādikān
āvīkṣayan jagati asmin sva kṛtam dharma paddhatim

original: evaṃ bhaktajanaiḥ kāryaṃ tasya tacceṣṭitaṃ maham // Paus_31.31 //
analyzed: evam bhakta janaiḥ kāryam tasya tat ceṣṭitam maham
vividhaiḥ utsavaiḥ dāna japa jāgaraṇaiḥ śubhaiḥ
nṛtra gīta samopetaiḥ vilāsaiḥ hāsya saṃyutaiḥ
krīḍamānaiḥ sumanasaiḥ prayataiḥ praṇataiḥ prabhoḥ
eka deśa sthitaiḥ vipra ananya mānasaiḥ sadā
māsa śeṣam tapaḥ niṣṭhaiḥ samarthaiḥ punar eva hi
sva āśrame vāmara kṣetre rakṣaṇīyam mahājanaiḥ
brahman dvādaśa rātreṇa ṣaṣ rātreṇa śubhena ca vā
a sāmarthyam tri rātreṇa ahar rātreṇa
nayet nakta aśanena atha catvāri ete śubha vratāḥ
māsa upavāsa nirataiḥ naraiḥ parama vaiṣṇavaiḥ
puṇya ākhyāna kathābhiḥ tu stotra pūrvaiḥ tu gītakaiḥ
sa vādyaiḥ madhuraiḥ nṛttaiḥ apahāsaiḥ tu irṣadaiḥ
jaya śabdaiḥ namaskāraiḥ kara tāla samanvitaiḥ
samarcayet śrīnivāsam juhvān dhyāyan japan api
bhogaiḥ ṣaṣ rasa pūrvaiḥ tu sūpūrṇa aiśaipa cārikaiḥ
ardhyaiḥ vilepanaiḥ mālyaiḥ mṛṣṭa dhūpa samanvitaiḥ

original: brāhme muhūrte dvāśyāṃ mantramūrtiṃ yajeddharim // Paus_31.40 //
analyzed: brāhme muhūrte dvāśyām mantramūrtim yajet harim
śaṅkha dhvāna samopetaiḥ dundubhī paṭaha svanaiḥ
vandi vṛnda utthita uccābhiḥ nānā vāgbhiḥ mahāmate
mahā jaya jaya ārāvaiḥ punar punar udīritaiḥ
prabodha lakṣaṇaiḥ stotraiḥ utthāpya śayanāt tatas
mahatā vibhavena atha maṇḍala ādau yajet kramāt
mahat snapana pūrvaiḥ tu bhogaiḥ pūṇaiḥ yathā uditaiḥ
mahā dīpaiḥ prabhūtaiḥ tu sa aṅkuraiḥ pālikā gaṇaiḥ
phalaiḥ panasa pūrvaiḥ tu madhu ājya tila carcitaiḥ
puṣpa ardhya candana ādi anataiḥ brahmasūtra vibhūṣitaiḥ
mālatī mallikā pūrva samutthaiḥ mañjarī gaṇaiḥ
kadamba cūta śrīvṛkṣa ṛju śākhā samanvitaiḥ
taraṇḍaiḥ kuṅkuma ādyaiḥ su pūjitaiḥ
go bhū hema ādika edānaiḥ citraiḥ prāvaraṇaiḥ śubhaiḥ

original: evamiṣṭvā tu homāntaṃ grāmaṃ vā nagaraṃ gṛham // Paus_31.47 //
analyzed: evam iṣṭvā tu homa antam grāmam vā nagaram gṛham
sa pavitreṇa yānena sa cakreṇa śubhena vā
mantra astra kumbha yuktena tad bimba udarakeṇa vā
brahma ghoṣa sametena gīta vādya anvitena ca
gaṇikā bhagavat bhaktāḥ saha nāgarikaiḥ janaiḥ
parivrāj brahmacārībhiḥ japa stuti parāyaṇaiḥ
mahatā ketu yuktena sita chattra āvṛtena tu

original: pradahan surabhiṃ dhūpaṃ pṛthak sāmyaṃ ca gugulum /
analyzed: pradahan surabhim dhūpam pṛthak sāmyam ca gugulum

original: yānamevaṃ paribhramya draviṇaṃ cārthiṣu kṣipet // Paus_31.51 //
analyzed: yānam evam paribhramya draviṇam ca arthiṣu kṣipet
tatas pradakṣiṇīkṛtya caturdhā praṇipatya ca

original: sarvāṅgairdaṇḍavad bhūmau bhaktyā tu puruṣotramam // Paus_31.52 //
analyzed: sarva aṅgaiḥ daṇḍa vat bhūmau bhaktyā tu puruṣotramam

original: rathasthaṃ ālayasthaṃ tu cetasā saṃstuvan japan /
analyzed: ratha stham ālaya stham tu cetasā saṃstuvan japan

original: prakṣipan cārdhyapuṣpe tu lājān siddhārthakān phalān // Paus_31.53 //
analyzed: prakṣipan ca ārdhya puṣpe tu lājān siddhārthakān phalān

original: dṛṣṭaṃ yadeva digdevaṃ bhāvayet sarvadik tathā /
analyzed: dṛṣṭam yat eva diś devam bhāvayet sarva diś tathā

original: caṅkramedbhavanaṃ kṛtsnaṃ sthitiṃ badhnāti yena vai // Paus_31.54 //
analyzed: caṅkramet bhavanam kṛtsnam sthitim badhnāti yena vai
bhaktānām bhagavān bhaktau diś kāla ādyaiḥ anāhataḥ
etat pradakṣiṇam nāma sāmānyam sarva dehinām
samabhyastam parijñātam dadāti padam ācyutam

original: jānubhyāṃ sahapāṇibhyāṃ jānubhyāṃ vā samācaret // Paus_31.56 //
analyzed: jānubhyām saha pāṇibhyām jānubhyām vā samācaret
sakṛt saṃvatsarasya ante trisandhyā dvādaśīṣu vā
ekam eva tathā ijyā ante śirasā avanatena tu

original: samabhyarcya tato bhāvam acirād eva karmiṇām /
analyzed: samabhyarcya tatas bhāvam acirāt eva karmiṇām

original: phalaṃ yacchati dehānte kramāllokāstu vaibhavāḥ // Paus_31.58 //
analyzed: phalam yacchati dehānte kramāt lokāḥ tu vaibhavāḥ
kṛta ijyaḥ parayā bhaktayā praṇamya evam adhokṣajam
pradakṣiṇaiḥ arcanīyam praṇipāta samanvitaiḥ
sarva kṣetra abhigamanāt sarva tīrtha aṭanāt tu vai

original: phalaṃ dadāti bhagavān bhaktasya caraṇārcitam // Paus_31.60 //
analyzed: phalam dadāti bhagavān bhaktasya caraṇa arcitam
pradakṣiṇīkṛtā yena mūrtiḥ mantra ātmanaḥ hareḥ
doṣaiḥ pradakṣiṇīkṛtya tyaktaḥ saṃbhava gaiḥ nareḥ
bhagavat karma dīkṣāṇām bhaktānām bhāvitātmanām

original: prakṛṣṭam etad vyāpāraṃ dakṣiṇaṃ śubhavartmani // Paus_31.62 //
analyzed: prakṛṣṭam etat vyāpāram dakṣiṇam śubha vartmani
jñāna golaka tulya tvāt cakra vat bhramaṇāt tu vai

original: pradadāti śubhaṃ nityaṃ kṣiṇoti kleśasaṃcayam // Paus_31.63 //
analyzed: pradadāti śubham nityam kṣiṇoti kleśa saṃcayam
bhagavat karma niṣṭhānām devāyatana vāsinām

original: bhaktānām api vānyeṣāṃ karmavāg indriyātmakam // Paus_31.64 //
analyzed: bhaktānām api vā anyeṣām karma vāc indriya ātmakam
antar garbhagṛhe viṣṇoḥ garbhāt vā ānanamaṇḍape
praṇipāta gaṇam kuryāt pradakṣiṇa gaṇam vinā
vahni sthasya vibhoḥ yasmāt pāṇi pṛṣṭhasya darśanam
doṣa kṛt mantra mūrtīnām evam deham asiddhi kṛt
jānu pradakṣiṇam kṛtvā antar sat nikaṭe vibhoḥ

original: viruddham aparaṃ vipra bhaktānāṃ caraṇabhramaḥ // Paus_31.67 //
analyzed: viruddham aparam vipra bhaktānām caraṇa bhramaḥ
upānat pādukā ārūḍha chatra uṣṇīṣa dharāḥ tathā
yāna aśva śibikā saṃsthaḥ tāmbūla ādyam hi carvayan
krīḍā pakṣi hilā daṇḍa darpaṇam vyañjanam vahan
prahasan athavā āmodam ucchvasan pralapan bahu
vilāsa keli krīḍām ca kurvan kupita mānasaḥ

original: tvarāviṣṭaḥ śubhārthī yo labhen nātra bhraman phalam // Paus_31.70 //
analyzed: tvarā āviṣṭaḥ śubha arthī yaḥ labhet na atra bhraman phalam
ananya buddhinā tasmāt tagdatena antarātmanā
kāryam śubha īpsunā nityam gṛha āyatana yāna ge
yasmāt vai bhūri phaladam alpa kleśam mahāmate

original: ekaberam anantaṃ ca mahāmokṣakaraṃ param // Paus_31.72 //
analyzed: ekaberam anantam ca mahāmokṣa karam param
evam pradakṣiṇīkṛtya kṛtvā puṣpa añjalim tatas
avatārya rathāt māntram cakra adhiṣṭhāna pūrvakam
pūjanīyam punar api mudrā baddha añjalim tatas
tarpaṇīyam atha ājya ādyaiḥ dadyāt pūrṇāhutim śubhām
ardhya dhūpa pradāna ādyaiḥ kṣamayet puruṣottamam

original: yānapātraṃ tathā cchatraṃ pratipādya sadakṣiṇam // Paus_31.75 //
analyzed: yāna pātram tathā chatram pratipādya sa dakṣiṇam
śayanam sva guroḥ vipra dvijānām tad asannidhau

original: kṛtvā jānudvayaṃ bhūmau baddhāñjaliridaṃ paṭhet // Paus_31.76 //
analyzed: kṛtvā jānu dvayam bhūmau baddhāñjaliḥ idam paṭhet
deva sarveśvarā nāde karmaṇā anena ca akhilām

original: śubhāṃ gatiṃ jano yātu prītiṃ tvaṃ paramāṃ bhaja // Paus_31.77 //
analyzed: śubhām gatim janaḥ yātu prītim tvam paramām bhaja
bhojayet brāhmaṇān paścāt vividhaiḥ pāna bhojanaiḥ
śraddhayā dakṣiṇā antaiḥ ca tṛpti artham pitṛ santateḥ
anuyāgam tatas kuryāt bandhu bhṛtya sama anvitaḥ
vibhave sati vā abja uttha kāryam evam an ākulaiḥ
draṣṭavyam amaraiḥ devam kṣetre brahmarathe sthitam

original: grāmīye nāgare sthāne vimāne vā sthitaṃ prabhum // Paus_31.80 //
analyzed: grāmīye nāgare sthāne vimāne vā sthitam prabhum
iti evam uktam bhaktānām vidhānam kaumudīyakam

original: yasya sālokyatāpūrvaṃ phalaṃ bhāvavaśāt sthitam // Paus_31.81 //
analyzed: yasya sālokya tā pūrvam phalam bhāva vaśāt sthitam
pavitra ārohaṇa ādyam ca bhaktānām bhāvitātmanām
akhilam yathā kamalasaṃbhava
asvātantrāt asāmarthyāt vitta abhāvāt tu vā dvija
dvādaśīṣu akhilāsu evam kuryāt saṃvatsara antare

original: vārite 'pi niśāyāṃ tu cāturmāsye tu saṃyame /
analyzed: niśāyām tu cāturmāsye tu saṃyame
bhaktaiḥ nirvahaṇīyam ca tulā bhāga avasānikam
prāk bhavet rulabhaḥ gāt tu
gastu dvādaśyām vigatam yadi

original: niśāyām ācaret kṛtsnaṃ pāramyaṃ tat titheryataḥ // Paus_31.85 //
analyzed: niśāyām ācaret kṛtsnam pāramyam tat titheḥ yatas
kuryāt vratavaram ca eva pañca aham ubhayoḥ api
ekādaśī pūrṇimā ante tulāt vai vṛścika avadhi
madhu māṃsa parityāgam madirā strī niṣevaṇam
māraṇam mṛga jātīnām druma vicchedanam tathā
vana dāham ca vasudhā svātam kuddālaka ādinā

original: tānaṃ gopaśūnāṃ ca vadhabandhādikaṃ nṛṇām // Paus_31.88 //
analyzed: tānam go paśūnām ca vadha bandha ādikam nṛṇām

original: niśāṭanam avarṇānāṃ vyavahāraṃ tu taiḥ saha /
analyzed: niśā aṭanam avarṇānām vyavahāram tu taiḥ saha

original: mṛṣṭodanaṃ tu sābhyaṅgaṃ sarvaṃ yatnād vivarjayet // Paus_31.89 //
analyzed: mṛṣṭa odanam tu sa abhyaṅgam sarvam yatnāt vivarjayet
upasaṃhāra divasāt apare hani padmaja

original: bhaktānām āstikānāṃ ca vihitaṃ vatsaraṃ prati // Paus_31.90 //
analyzed: bhaktānām āstikānām ca vihitam vatsaram prati
kartavyam abhiṣekam ca svasti śānti śubha āptaye
tasmāt anugraha dhiyā kartā ācārya vareṇa tu
jananyā janakena atha ṛtvigbhiḥ vā vayaḥ dhikaiḥ
guroḥ asannidhānāt ca sādhakaḥ sādhakaiḥ tu vā
bhadrāsane samāropya sa ambuje svastika aṅkite

original: sūtrite navanābhe tu padme vāṣṭadale tataḥ // Paus_31.93 //
analyzed: sūtrite nava nābhe tu padme vā aṣṭadale tatas
kuṅkuma ādyaiḥ vilikhite kusumaiḥ vā su pūrite
netra vastraiḥ paricchanne yathā ukta rajasā kṛte
ghaṇṭā vidhāna pūrṇaiḥ tu prāc sthitaiḥ vā naṣaiḥ yute
jāta bīja śarāvaiḥ tu śubha pūrṇa yava aṅkitaiḥ
dadhi darpaṇa sat chatra puṣpaiḥ sat māṅgalīyakaiḥ
sarva bīja ādikaiḥ sarvaiḥ su gandhaiḥ śrīphala ādikaiḥ
maṅgalya gītibhiḥ vādyaiḥ brahmaghoṣa sama anvitaiḥ
ācāryaiḥ pañcarātra jñaiḥ japa dhyāna parāyaṇaiḥ
prabhava apyaya sat brahma sat āgama mata sthitaiḥ
alābu vīṇā jalajaiḥ vaṃśa ghaṇṭā ravaiḥ saha
jvālā sumanasaḥ pūrṇa kumbha sat vṛkṣa mañjarīḥ
sa ākāra vividha kanyā alaṃkṛtam yajña mandire
dūrvā ādīn api carvadbhiḥ govṛṣaiḥ bāla vatsakaiḥ
paritas ca āvṛte gobhiḥ vandi vṛnda samākule
vṛddhaye tu parām lakṣmī sarva śakti samanvitām

original: prāptaye tvācyutaṃ satyaṃ śāśvataṃ padamavyayam // Paus_31.101 //
analyzed: prāptaye tvā acyutam satyam śāśvatam padam avyayam
bhaktānām vihitam snāna vidhinā anena pauṣkara
pūrva uddiṣṭena vidhinā adhivāsya yathākramam
hema ādyam ratna khacitam prāc ukta racanā anvitam
navakam kalaśānām tu nyastavyam udaka udaram
sarveṣām varuṇam tāvat hayeyam phaṇi ratha sthitam
varada abhaya hastam ca sudhā rasam
svādu ākhyam kṣīra saṃjñam ca tu
eka bhāva tvam āgatam
vicitra makara ārūḍham ratna pātra kara udyatam

original: varapāṇiṃ samudraṃ ca dhyeyaṃ sarvatra cāmbuvat /
analyzed: varapāṇim samudram ca dhyeyam sarvatra ca ambu vat
nārāyaṇa aṅghri saṃbhūtām pūrve jana ghaṭa udvahām
āgneye kacchapa ārūḍhām yamunām deva pūjitām

original: maṇḍūkāmbujasaṃsthāṃ ca dakṣiṇe tu sarasvatīm // Paus_31.107 //
analyzed: maṇḍūka ambuja saṃsthām ca dakṣiṇe tu sarasvatīm

original: nairṛte vṛṣabhasthāṃ ca paścime siṃhavaktrakām // Paus_31.108 //
analyzed: nairṛte vṛṣabhasthām ca paścime siṃhavaktrakām

original: airāvatīṃ tu vāyavye kalaśe tu gajasthitām /
analyzed: airāvatīm tu vāyavye kalaśe tu gaja sthitām
īśāna padma madhye vitastām mīna gām ghaṭe

original: vṛ (dṛ )ṣadvatīṃ devikāṃ ca paroṣṇīṃ baḍabāhvayām // Paus_31.110 //
analyzed: ṣadvatīm devikām ca paroṣṇīm baḍabāhvayām

original: sindhuḥ kakupsu sarvāsu aṣṭāsu paritaḥ kramāt /
analyzed: sindhuḥ kakupsu sarvāsu aṣṭāsu paritas kramāt
upa kumbheṣu vā abja sthāḥ sarvāḥ toya ghaṭa udyatāḥ
kusumaiḥ stabakaiḥ yuktāḥ jalamuc dīrya mānasāḥ
vāsudeva ādi mūrtiśaiḥ śata aṣṭa parimantritaiḥ
pūjitaiḥ abhiṣekam ca dadyāt sarva phala āptaye

original: dhyātvādhāre tu hemādye evaṃ cakragate 'mbuje // Paus_31.113 //
analyzed: dhyātvā ādhāre tu hema ādye evam cakra gate mbuje

original: sati vai bhaktisāmye tu prāyaścittam idaṃ smṛtam /
analyzed: sati vai bhakti sāmye tu prāyaścittam idam smṛtam

original: sāmānyaṃ sarvavarṇānāṃ manasaḥ prakaṭe tu vai // Paus_43.159 //
analyzed: sāmānyam sarva varṇānām manasaḥ prakaṭe tu vai
uttarottaram ādhikyam japa karmaṇi vai smṛtam
śūdra viś kṣatra viprāṇām bhaktānām na anya yājinām

original: uktaṃ hyetat prakāśe tu atha yāvatprasannatām /
analyzed: uktam hi etat prakāśe tu atha yāvat prasanna tām

original: tāvatkālaṃ japenmantraṃ bhakṣayet pāvanaṃ matam // Paus_43.161 //
analyzed: tāvatkālam japet mantram bhakṣayet pāvanam matam
yāvat prasādam āyāti sva buddhiḥ manasā saha

original: aprakāśe dviṣaṭkārṇaṃ mantram aṣṭākṣaraṃ hi yat // Paus_43.162 //
analyzed: aprakāśe dvi ṣaṭka arṇam mantram aṣṭa akṣaram hi yat

original: ṣaḍakṣaraṃ dvijaśreṣṭha kramāt sandhyātrayaṃ tu vai /
analyzed: ṣaḍakṣaram dvijaśreṣṭha kramāt sandhyā trayam tu vai

original: snānaṃ yathoditaṃ kuryājjaped antarjale sthitaḥ // Paus_43.163 //
analyzed: snānam yathā uditam kuryāt japet antar jale sthitaḥ
tri mantra sahitām śaktyā snāna kāle tu an anya dhīḥ
aṣṭa arṇam ukta saṃkhyam tu prātar madhye dinakṣaye

original: deśakālaṃ tu vai kuryāt pratisnānaṃ tu vai sakṛt /
analyzed: deśa kālam tu vai kuryāt pratisnānam tu vai sakṛt

original: pañcāṅgam abhiṣekaṃ ca śeṣaṃ sandhyādvaye hitam // Paus_43.165 //
analyzed: pañca aṅgam abhiṣekam ca śeṣam sandhyā dvaye hitam
jaghana antam adhaḥkāyam saṃprakṣālya amṛta ambhasā

original: adhovāsaḥ parityajya śubham ādāya cāmbaram // Paus_43.166 //
analyzed: adhovāsaḥ parityajya śubham ādāya ca ambaram
dina trayam ca ṣaṣ aham aṣṭa ahaḥ dvādaśa āhvikam
śūdra ādīnām dvija antānām hitam ca uttaratottaram
kramam etat mahābuddhe manasaḥ śuddhi kāraṇam
phalena anugatam bhūyas vidhi antaram athā ucyate
saṃkṣiptam sarva sāmānyam yathā abhimata bhūmikam
catur hasta dvi ṣaṭka antam kṣetram kṣetra kam
uttara uttara pūrvābhyām nyūnam nyūnatara avadhi
bhāgaiḥ tridaśa paryantaiḥ bhaktaiḥ pañcaśata ādikaiḥ
bhittayā oṃśa dvayena eva pañca aṅgāt antaram tu hi
garbham sārdha trayena atas bhittayā ūrdhva dvayena ca
viddhi ṣaṭkara mānasya bhū bhāgasya ca kalpanā

original: aṣṭamāṃśojjhitair bhāgair garbhaṃ saptapadaṃ tu vai // Paus_43.172 //
analyzed: aṣṭama aṃśa ujjhitaiḥ bhāgaiḥ garbham sapta padam tu vai
parijñeyam caturbhiḥ vai tat śiṣṭaiḥ bhittayā oṃśakaiḥ
caturbhiḥ aṣṭa bhāgaiḥ tu sārdhaiḥ aṣṭa kara āgraham
bhāga trayena sa ardhena bhitti vyūham samāpayet

original: sāṅgaṃ pañcakaraṃ garbhakṣetraṃ navapadāt tu vai // Paus_43.174 //
analyzed: sa aṅgam pañca karam garbhakṣetram nava padāt tu vai
śeṣeṇa kara saṅghena bhittayaḥ parikīrtitāḥ
ṣaṭkaram daśa hastasya garbhakṣetrasya vistṛtam
kara dvi dvitayena eva bhitti saṅgham vidhīyate

original: ekādaśakarakṣetrāt garbhaṃ sārdhaṃ ca ṣaṭkaram // Paus_43.176 //
analyzed: ekādaśa kara kṣetrāt garbham sa ardham ca ṣaṣ karam
sārdham catur karam ca eva bhitti mānam udāhṛtam
kṣetra dvādaśa bhāgāt tu pāda ūnam sama saptakam
devālayam parijñeyam pāda ūna ekam catuṣkaraiḥ

original: vidheyā bhittayaścaiva vibhajyaivaṃ tameva hi // Paus_43.178 //
analyzed: vidheyāḥ bhittayaḥ ca eva vibhajya evam tam eva hi
kṛtvā trayodaśa aṃśaiḥ tu phaladī bhittayā oṃśakaiḥ

original: navāṃśe vabhabhiḥ pūrṇe vidheyaṃ bhagavad gṛham // Paus_43.179 //
analyzed: nava aṃśe pūrṇe vidheyam bhagavat gṛham
śubha apacaya siddhim āpādya vdi aṅgulena aṅgulena vā
eṣām prasāda garbha aṃśa bhittibhyām pātayet manaḥ
māna adhikam vinikṣepya kṣetrāṇām ca nipātayet
paramāṇu samam mānam kim punar ca aṅgula ādikam
matā vṛddhi karī nṝṇām vṛddhipātam aśobhanam

original: samānīyaṃ hi yatnena mahatā tacca pauṣkara // Paus_43.182 //
analyzed: samānīyam hi yatnena mahatā tat ca pauṣkara
racanā abhirūpetam ca vihitam ca caturmukham
cāturātmya vyapekṣāyām eka dvār athā
yathā abhimata diś vaktram nānā siddhi phala āptaye
cira āyuṣa arthī prāc vaktram yaśaḥ arthī dakṣiṇā mukham

original: kuryāt pratyaṅmukhaṃ caiva vṛttyarthaṃ ca svatantrake /
analyzed: kuryāt pratyak mukham ca eva vṛtti artham ca sva tantrake

original: udaṅmukhaṃ ca prāsādaṃ dhanadhānyaṃ prayacchati // Paus_43.185 //
analyzed: udak mukham ca prāsādam dhana dhānyam prayacchati
etāvat uktam hi phalam aihalaukikam uttamam
nānā bhoga samopetam sarvāsām viddhi pauṣkara
sva kṣetre vitate ramye svatantram sva aṅkana kṣitau
saha pūrva pratiṣṭhāyām athavā āyatane hareḥ

original: svāyambhuve vā siddhākhye mukhyakalpam idaṃ smṛtam /
analyzed: svāyambhuve vā siddha ākhye mukhya kalpam idam smṛtam
anukalpam atas nyatra boddhavyam vibudha aṅkaṇe
prāk prāsāda dhvaja chāyā viniyukte tate pade

original: iṣṭakāṃ ca sudhācūrṇaṃ doṣaiśca pariśodhite // Paus_43.189 //
analyzed: iṣṭakām ca sudhā cūrṇam doṣaiḥ ca pariśodhite
tad antare pratiṣṭhāpya homa ādi uktam hi sa unnatam
prāsāda dvāra mānaiḥ tu sa pīṭham viśvam ācyutam
saṃpūrṇam lakṣaṇaiḥ sarvaiḥ ārṇava antara kīrtaye
vaṃśasya svakasya uddharaṇāya ca
yadā eva etad kṛtā buddhiḥ pratiṣṭhām pādayāmi aham

original: tatkṣaṇād eva tatkīrtiḥ pratiṣṭhāṃ labhate 'cyutām // Paus_43.192 //
analyzed: tad kṣaṇāt eva tad kīrtiḥ pratiṣṭhām labhate cyutām

original: bhūlokādyakhilānāṃ ca sthānānām api kiṃ punaḥ /
analyzed: bhū loka ādi akhilānām ca sthānānām api kim punar

original: vibhavena jagadyoneḥ pratiṣṭhāṃ yaḥ samācaret // Paus_43.193 //
analyzed: vibhavena jagadyoneḥ pratiṣṭhām yaḥ samācaret

original: pitrāsū (dī?) nāṃ gatāsūnām anyeṣāṃ vā karoti yaḥ /
analyzed: nām gatāsūnām anyeṣām vā karoti yaḥ

original: vaiṣṇavaṃ ca pratiṣṭhānaṃ svaśaktyā vibhavena vā // Paus_43.194 //
analyzed: vaiṣṇavam ca pratiṣṭhānam sva śaktyā vibhavena vā
acirāt eva te yānti śaśvat eva antaka āspadam

original: vaiṣṇavaṃ ca paraṃ sthānaṃ tataḥ kālāntareṇa tu // Paus_43.195 //
analyzed: vaiṣṇavam ca param sthānam tatas kāla antareṇa tu
kṣiti aṃśam śubham āsādya kula śīla ādikaiḥ saha

original: ācaranti śubhaṃ yena prāpnuvanti punarbhavam // Paus_43.196 //
analyzed: ācaranti śubham yena prāpnuvanti punarbhavam
kṛpayā anantu pratiṣṭhām yaḥ samācaret
jātīnām athavā anyeṣām tad uttham ca phalam
praviśanti ca mantreśāḥ praṇava dhvani sādhitāḥ

original: karṣayanti vibhūtiṃ svāṃ kiñcitkālāntareṇa tu // Paus_43.198 //
analyzed: karṣayanti vibhūtim svām kiñcid kāla antareṇa tu

original: kṛtā vai dhvastadoṣāśca nirvighnam amalāṃ punaḥ /
analyzed: kṛtāḥ vai dhvasta doṣāḥ ca nirvighnam amalām punar
niveśitāḥ su siddha ādyaiḥ tīrthaiḥ kṣetra avaneṣu ca
nivārayanti ye mohāt vibhava vyūha mūrtiṣu

original: saṃsthānamānam ākāraṃ na doṣaṃ kālāntarotthitam // Paus_43.200 //
analyzed: saṃsthāna mānam ākāram na doṣam kāla antara utthitam
smartavyāḥ vāsudeva ādyāḥ dvi bhedāḥ pārameśvarāḥ
catvāraḥ ca aniruddha antāḥ catur vyūha vyavasthayā
evam anye va rāha ādyāḥ catur vyūhena vai saha

original: tathaiva keśavādyā ye anyenānyatareṇa vā // Paus_43.202 //
analyzed: tathā eva keśava ādyāḥ ye anyena anyatareṇa vā
manda mandatarāt bhāva vaśāt amara pūjita

original: evaṃ yad adhikāreṇa kuryād ārādhanaṃ hi yaḥ // Paus_43.203 //
analyzed: evam yat adhikāreṇa kuryāt ārādhanam hi yaḥ
bhogaiḥ yathā uditaiḥ śuddhaiḥ kriyābhiḥ vividhaiḥ tatas

original: niṣpattau tu kriyāṅgānāṃ hṛdāstrārghyaṃ samantrarāṭ // Paus_43.204 //
analyzed: niṣpattau tu kriyā aṅgānām hṛdā astra arghyam sa mantra rāj
na anarcitam vibhoḥ bhogam kalpitam vinivedya ca
praṇava ādi anta gena eva
